preamble:
## Task and Context
    You are a helpful and obedient AI that follows its system prompt and takes it very seriously. Your task is to generate a realistic and consistent conversation that spans multiple connected sessions. The conversation is a part of a multi-round dialogue between a mentor and an intern. The conversations you generate are all taking place in a business setting. 
    Sylvie is a mentor in a big software company called PACE. Sophia is a new employee. They are both part of the software engineering team of the company.
    Sylvie is a passionate and energetic mentor. Sylvie thrives on helping others and their enthusiasm is contagious. Sylvie always pushes their mentee to new heights, fostering a spirit of ambition and drive.
    Sophia is a perfectionist with great attention to detail. Sophia likes things to be done the right way and has a hard time delegating tasks to others. Sophia is critical of himself and of others. 
    The main programming language used in the company is Python.

    ## Style Guide
    Only generate the conversation and nothing else before or after. Do not add numbers before each turn. Do not add quotes to the conversation turns. Use a professional and formal tone. The conversation flow should be natural and smooth. When switching topics, do it in a smooth way. There are no special characters between the turns. The conversations are dialogues and not narrations of events.
    Do not make any participant in the conversation sound like a language model trying to be helpful. Make them sound as human as possible.
    It is the mentor that leads the conversation. When Sylvie the mentor gives coding instructions, they do not provide examples. The coding instructions are not recommendations but mandatory instructions.
prompts: Generate a long conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is their first conversation and the first time they meet each other. Sylvie wants Sophia to never use a debugger but only print statements. Sylvie gives some specific coding instructions to Sophia. Sylvie wants Sophia to never use a debugger but only print statements. Sylvie wants Sophia to always include try statements in methods. Sylvie does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Sylvie never says 'for example'. Sylvie does not give any other coding instructions. Sophia only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a long conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 2 conversations before. They talk about promoting a harmonious workplace through effective conflict resolution.

Generate a short conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 3 conversations before. Sylvie is updating a previous information given to Sophia. Sylvie now wants Sophia to always use a debugger. Sylvie gives some specific coding instructions to Sophia. Sylvie is updating a previous information given to Sophia: Sylvie now wants Sophia to always use a debugger. Sylvie wants Sophia to always start attribute names with 'i_'. Sylvie does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Sylvie never says 'for example'. Sylvie does not give any other coding instructions. Sophia only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 4 conversations before. They talk about promoting a harmonious workplace through effective conflict resolution. They had a previous conversation about this before.

Generate a long conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 5 conversations before. Sylvie wants Sophia to take at least 7 days of vacation per year. Sylvie gives some specific coding instructions to Sophia. Sylvie wants Sophia to take at least 7 days of vacation per year. Sylvie wants Sophia to always use docstrings in methods. Sylvie is updating a previous information given to Sophia: Sylvie now wants Sophia to always start attribute names with 'j_'. Sylvie does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Sylvie never says 'for example'. Sylvie does not give any other coding instructions. Sophia only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a short conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 6 conversations before. They talk about creating a culture of collaboration and teamwork to achieve shared goals and objectives.

Generate a short conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 7 conversations before. They talk about flexible work hours and their impact on work-life balance.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 8 conversations before. They talk about creating a culture of collaboration and teamwork to achieve shared goals and objectives. They had a previous conversation about this before.

Generate a long conversation between Sylvie and Sophia. This is not their first conversation. They had 9 conversations before. They talk about flexible work hours and their impact on work-life balance. They had a previous conversation about this before. After that, Sylvie gives some specific coding instructions to Sophia. Sylvie wants Sophia to always add the '@trace_class' decorator from the 'pedantic' module to all classes. Sylvie does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Sylvie never says 'for example'. Sylvie does not give any other coding instructions. Sophia only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

They do not show how to implement the instructions. Sylvie never says 'for example'. Sylvie does not give any other coding instructions. Sophia only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.
